website_summaries.verdict: Great for touch-typists and those with larger hands, but the full size of the keyboard means additional weight.
pros: The full-size keys placed in a typical layout makes this comparable to typing on a standard computer keyboard
Pairs easily over Bluetooth and also connects to devices via USB
Comes with a case that folds into phone or tablet stand
cons: and 1 ft. long, this keyboard is much larger than others, though still portable

customer_reviews.title: 1st two(!) of these were terrific. 3rd failed very early
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement after giving one away as a demo/gift to a colleague... & my first one has worked well. In fact, have bought & gifted 2 of these, & only this one failed, maybe upon arrival (I had little reason to use it for several months, while I experimented with a laptop at mtgs.) Today, 6 months later, find that it's physically broken and is useless. I find the right side wing of lower keys don't work, including the Enter key... & that there's a visibly elevated ribbon cable loosely folded next to the "/?" key. (See photo) Too late to return... Will mfgr support a repair or replace?
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Helpful Accessory to Android Mobile Devices
customer_reviews.text: I had previously written a review about my negative experience with the Plugable bluetooth keyboard, and the company promptly contacted me to inquire about my issues - and to make things right by replacing my what-appeared-to-be-defective keyboard with a new one. I have just paired the new keyboard with my Android-based tablet, and the new keyboard appears to be working quite well. Now, I can recommend this product. For me, it is particularly useful when traveling and I don't want to carry my laptop. I can just use the portable Plugable keyboard and a tablet for quick trips.
customer_reviews.author: Rich W.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes keys don't register when typing quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Typing performance is pretty bad compared to other keyboards I've used. Keys don't register unless you type right in the center of the keys. When typing quickly, I often will hit the side of a key. On my built in MacBook Pro keyboard and on a Microsoft Natural Ergonomic Keyboard 4000 that I paid $35 for, the keys register fine when doing this, but they don't register on this keyboard (see video). Also, often I will get a double "m" or a double "r" when typing those keys once. The form factor, however, is impressive, and the keyboard feels solid. I just wish it didn't slow down my typing the way it does.
customer_reviews.author: JoeKing

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard Disconnects Frequently
customer_reviews.text: I am using this keyboard with an Samsung Tablet (Android). The keyboard will keep disconnecting from the Tablet, which causes me to have to wait for the keyboard to reconnect before I can continue typing. If I don't notice the keyboard has disconnected, I drop text while I am taking notes in class (not good). Worse yet, using the MS Word App, the shift key doesn't work - outside the App, the shift key works, inside the App it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: F Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service - one note on function keys
customer_reviews.text: First of all. The product is amazing. Great build quality. Immediately recognized by windows 10. Great customer service. Would recommend buying it. Second of all, for me as a programmer it was not the best choice because there is no way to use in the function keys (F1-F12) without using the Fn key. That having been said. If you do not need the Fn keys, this is exactly what you’re looking for.
customer_reviews.author: adexios

customer_reviews.title: Strange layout, great keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I like this keyboard very much. I bought it to use it with my Galaxy Note 5 and it works great. The reason I am deducting one star is the layout is not what I was used to, what I have used in little netbooks, which I was thinking this keyboard to be, but is not, so you have to learn the keys again. But besides that, it works perfect, it suspends after some minutes of inactivity but reactivates by pressing any key. Shuts down when you fold it and turns on when you unfold it, pretty cool. I recommend this keyboard to anyone who wants to make his phone or tablet more productive.
customer_reviews.author: Jovao do Santos

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Amazon Mixes Reviews Here of the Compact & Full-Size Models!
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Amazon mixes together the reviews of the Compact and Full-Size keyboard models, which is unfortunate. Note that the Compact model has a very small “Shift” key on the right-hand side. I now see several other reviewers also found this to be very annoying. The Full-Size model does not have this flaw. I don’t recommend the Compact model because of this problem and wish I had gotten the Full-Size model instead.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Santos

customer_reviews.title: works well for typing
customer_reviews.text: The first one did not work...it missed characters. I thought it was the slow android tablet. Later tried on an ipad, and it was the same. I wrote Plugable. Even though it was two years since i purchased, they sent me a new one that works correctly, no questions and no delays. Plugable has excellent customer support, and the new keyboard works correctly, with no missed or skipped characters. I will be coming back when I next need something Plugable makes. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Works very well via bluetooth. Has a very nice feel and is not too cramped. It has several additional buttons you can use to better control your computer/tablet/phone. Battery life so far is very good and has not run out yet it is also a nice feature to have a switch based on what it item it is connected to (android, apple). It works rather well on a desk and to some extent on your lap( may fold up) could use some sort of locking mechanism to keep the keyboard open. Overall the case working as a stand and the small compact size make this one of the best portable bluetooth keyboards available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Nice wireless keyboard, but does not work well with my HP Probook 6470b built in Bluetooth. When this kbd is connected to the built in Bluetooth adapter, sometimes stray keys appear without being typed. May be interference from 2.4GHz RF USB mouse. Works well with with another USB Bluetooth adapter (no more interference with 2.4GHz RF mouse). In mechanical terms, it feels solid, like the legs on outside edge, gives the keyboard rigidity. Sometimes need to type a little harder on keys.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemustang2000

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a good thumb typer and I have not a laptop so this lets me type on a full-size keyboard when I'm not at home on my computer or if I want to do a long text. I had an issue with my first one, only because I did not understand and their customer service was great. I found it a little hard to connect my phone and tablet with blue tooth because their instructions were not very complete. Even when I went online there was no real manual; I may be one of the few that still reads them but I'd like to see a complete manual.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Golden

customer_reviews.title: Good little keyboard — and it’s space gray.
customer_reviews.text: The full size keyboard is just that. It feels natural. The metal is space gray, which is good because it matches my devices. The outer cover that doubles as a stand adds a bit more bulk than expected. I’m half tempted to loose it and buy a separate mini stand. In the end I was looking for a collapsible full sized keyboard which matched my existing accessories and devices, and didn’t have any weird separations when expanded. This keyboard hit every mark I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Thompson Rocks

customer_reviews.title: Great solution: well-made, and convenient AF
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Well-made and good feel. Keys are big and responsive. Cons: Battery strength doesn’t show up in IOS battery widget. There are some small compromises on keyboard layout but none were dealbreakers for me. The fact that I can literally slip a sturdy responsive keyboard in my pocket rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Early Adapter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice high quality
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and comes with a stand, unlike others of this same design. I bought both the full size and the compact version and cant decide which is my favorite. Easy to pair. Works with my Android, iOS, and Windows tables flawless. Aluminum construction makes it more sturdy then plastics at this price point. I have a Logitech that cost over $100 and it has been lost to the drawer. Something to note, does not work well on your lap unless supported. Only con so far.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay awake and connected. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has only lasted me a few months before it started acting up. Now, despite being charged, and even when connected to USB, it goes to sleep and disconnects from Bluetooth. I have to close it and open it again every 2-3 minutes to wake it up. It is extremely frustrating to use like this. This is my second one, as my first one I got replaced because after a week of use, some keys stopped responding. I do respect my devices and am not rough with them, and yet this happens. I'm extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Well built Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I supervise a buch of millenials, who take it as a personal affront if I ever call them on their work phone instead of texting. I hate texting. I bought this s a compromise--I can now text without using that stupid on screen keyboard. I also started using it for my 10" Tab. It works great, and feels very durable. It doesn't lock open in any way, so it would be difficult to use in your lap but as long as you have a flat surface it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lags and repeats keystrokes
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to work well, and still does on occasion, but the keyboard gets stuck repeating a keystroke too much for it to be useful. Youll be typing fine when it starts to lag, or just out of the blue, it will repeat the last keystroke, all of a sudden I'm ttyypppiinngggg ttterribblle. And backspacing will delete half the word instead of a single letter. Would be great if it worked better. Maybe there's a solution but I haven't found one yet. Does the same thing with multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Doug R. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Nice key depth, but...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a keyboard with a really shallow key depth (as close to the butterfly style keys on the touch bar MacBook Pros), and this came about as close as one can. Overall, it works pretty well and I'm happy. My only gripe is that the keys are unforgiving. Even with the shallow key depth, the key has to be firmly pushed in (i.e. seated all the way in) to make sure the character registers. I have to watch the screen carefully to make sure I'm not missing any keystrokes.
customer_reviews.author: SkiBum

customer_reviews.title: No FnLock, F-Keys require Fn key.
customer_reviews.text: Great folding keyboard for larger hands. -2 Stars because the f-keys require the function button but it has no function lock. I could forgive one or the other, but making the f-keys require it and at the same time leaving out such a standard feature was a poor choice. Hard to recommend for anything beyond casual texting, which is a shame because it feels really nice. I would gladly use this for work if it were not for this flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Hammerbacher

customer_reviews.title: This Device is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Once I thought it was not working, I reached out to the company and they responded very quickly. Also they offered to send me a replacement free. But I found out that the battery needed charging. I never realized that I had to charge it. I had used it for months without ever having to charge it. It obviously holds a charge for a long time. I recently lost my original one and immediately ordered a replacement. You cannot go wrong with this one. Oh Yes, it is compatible with my android.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me truly mobile!
customer_reviews.text: This is SUCH a great little keyboard for my Android phone. It's a little heavy compared to my old Palm device that had a keyboard, but I can use it with a phone, a tablet -- anything Bluetooth that would benefit from a real keyboard. Other Bluetooth keyboards I've tried have felt flimsy and too lightweight. This folds up into it's case/stand so sturdy and stable. LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: LKPMil

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with performance
customer_reviews.text: I got this folding keyboard to use with my tablet and have been very pleased with performance. Works very well (make sure you're plugging the cables in correctly). Lightweight, portable, convenient, and no worrying about who's trying to hack my tablet since I can use it with cable and not Bluetooth. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grackal

customer_reviews.title: Good normal size keyboard, and great tablet holder
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and smooth folding. Normal size of keyboard, unlike most of others, which are too small for comfortable intuitive typing. The amazing part is that the cover converted tablet holder holds my surface book stable in portrait position for reading and quick noting. The best portable keyboard so far after trying quite a few.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Chien

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than the iClever model it replaced. I had an iClever model from 18 months ago for a while, and then a key failed. That company sent me a new one, which was really unresponsive. Drove me nuts. So I just paid for this one, and it works like a charm. The hard magnetic case is a nice bonus, but the stand is somewhat useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had dozens of keyboards, including high quality 'clicky' DAS keyboards. I have tried many mobile keyboards for my iPad. Now, I just have one for both. I plug this one in when at my desktop, and take it with me when I go mobile. I use it paired up with a 12" MacBook and 11 inch iPad Pro as second display. Most important for is that the keyboard cover acts as a stand - which allows you to put the iPad in PORTRAIT MODE!!!! When working on an 11" screen, it is great to be able to use page layout and see the full document as WYSIWYG. Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I used this keyboard this past weekend with my iPad. I was even able to use it on my lap very easily. It feels very well made. I think the manual/paper work could be improved if it were more specific especially for Apple products. I haven't used it long enough to know anything about the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Love This Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sturdy and compact. I LOVE it. The only complaint I might have is that it's really heavy - but that's a byproduct of how sturdy this thing really is, and I would carry the weight than worry about it breaking. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: kc_shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Kindle 10
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this keyboard for a couple of days, but it is absolutely perfect with my new Kindle 10, and my regular laptop also connected to it without a problem. Although on the small side, I have no trouble using it as I would any full-size keyboard. It paired quickly and easily with both devices, and I have no trouble using it. It charged up within, I think, about two hours. The included stand works fantastic for both of my kindle fires (7" and 10") I am completely satisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra Vasyuta

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Only issue is one of my own making - the ledge the tablet sits on on the folding case is a little narrow as my tablet is in a protective beetle case. Because of this, the tablet will slip off at the slightest jiggle. Without the beetle case the tablet would likely fit well on the ledge. Size of folded case with keyboard is perfect for sliding in my purse or half-size messenger bag along with the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: elma

customer_reviews.title: Compact version - some keys on fold don't register unless hit hard
customer_reviews.text: Got the compact version, great build, case holds up my 16 inch wacom tablet and holds even while i draw on it. Keyboard stays connected via bluetooth fine. Only Con is that some keys that are on the fold don't work, you have to really hit them hard to register, really disappointing having to hit "e" key over and over before it appears.
customer_reviews.author: NG Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases I've made for my EDC
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made for my EDC. I do a lot of work on my cellphone and document throughout the day so this keyboard allows me to knock out my thoughts a lot faster than if I was twitter thumbing the crap out of my keyboard. Highly recommend if you're a college student, journalist, etc. to where you take a lot of note or have to put out a lot of information out on messages to groups. The functionality of a keyboard will always be easier than two thumbs on a screen
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best folding keyboard I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: The best folding keyboard I have ever seen. The back is metal therefore strong, the hinges work well, folding and unfolding is easy. The case is a beautifully designed: smooth, sexy feel, like a leather jacket. The size of the keyboard is larger than on my 12-inch laptop. My only wish would be to have a locking mechanism so that the keyboard could lie flat (on the lap for example) and not close on itself. It shouldn't be difficult to design. Very easy bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Pratan

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this keyboard!!! It is unbelievably well constructed, and portable. It is so much better than I expected and exactly what I was looking for! I keep thinking I’m typing on a computer and reaching for the mouse lol.
customer_reviews.author: Ham'sMom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, function and bonus stand/cover
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality and function! Reading the other reviews on this, I decided to purchase it and love it. Besides the quality and the cool metal feel and looks, it funtions very well. The right hand shift key is more to the right and you'll have to get used to that, but no biggie. The bonus is the cover that will convert into a stand for your phone, that rocks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: I get this thing and it G and O key are both stuck and only register like 50% of the time
customer_reviews.text: *Update* - support was at least really helpful, they refunded me right away and offered to send me a new one. VERY professional, thanks David. I'll probably order another one and hopefully it works, but either regard, they did a really good job on keeping their customers happy. Updated review to 4 star since it does seem like others are having a good experience with it Wow, 4.5 stars? I get this thing and it G and O key are both stuck and only register like 50% of the time? Hopefully Plugable support can be helpful here if their support team does something
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. The battery lasts plenty long and connects right ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The battery lasts plenty long and connects right away to my Samsung tab. I don't like a case on my tablet so the case for the keyboard is really handy when I do need to type as it holds the tablet up perfectly. Would have given 5 stars but sometimes I lose the connection with the tablet and have to open and close it to reconnect. This could be an issue on the tablet though as opposed to the keyboard. But for $40 this thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a solid piece of technology that I usually carry with me, even when I might not write on the device to which it’s paired. This is my second keyboard. I got the first one wet and replaced it immediately. Says a lot, don’t you think?
customer_reviews.author: G. N. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Also pretty heavy. Overall
customer_reviews.text: Neat concept, but really seemed to flex too much -- even with the feet out. Did not end up keeping this. Also pretty heavy. Overall, what you're saving in storage volume is being paid for in heft and complexity. Would suggest sticking with a more conventional keyboard design if possible. The folding seems cool, but in practice it detracts significantly from the typing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jason A

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I have had it for more than a year. I use it every day. I like that it folds up and that the case becomes a stand for my tablet. Typing is comfortable. It’s easily portable. It holds a charge for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: dodd9702

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is fabulous. I'm a computer programmer and live in front of a keyboard. Typing texts and emails on my touch-screen cell phone and tablet was painful, especially with long nails. I wanted a bluetooth keyboard that was full-size and has the "feel" of a real keyboard. This product delivers!! Now I can respond to emails and texts quickly and accurately. No more typing brief, abbreviated responses that inadvertently lose their meaning.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy P.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described - well made and convenient
customer_reviews.text: It works just as described and the case is fantastic for holding up any IPAD while you FaceTime or work on the keyboard. iPads aren't very keyboard friendly unless you are specifically typing in a word-processing app or writing long emails... I have found a few good times to use this and am grateful for the excellent construction and ease of connection. Next up: will it connect to my xbox?
customer_reviews.author: Owen Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Portable Bluetooth Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my iPhone 6. It is extremly portable, and handy to use especially if your fingers are large and hit more than one key on the phone. The keyboard's keys are very responsive. The only improvement I would like to see is a switch that would be able to change the device you are using.Similar to the logitec that has 3 way switching capability. This would be handy while using a Pad, and a phone, etc. This keyboard has greater portability than the competion's keyboard's.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Milewski

customer_reviews.title: Stands out from the pack
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed keyboard. Full sized when unfolded and keys well laid out so no learning period for typing. No problem pairing with iPad. There are tabs at both sides that rotate and prevent the keyboard from tipping to the side. Seems well built and durable although a bit heavy. The case is very nice too and differentiates the Plugable from other similar folding keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: ATL Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: A hard-to-find item:  a FULL SIZE portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Folds up compactly (in thirds) inside sturdy case. Works as it's supposed to (if you read the paper instructions instead of the symbols on the keys) and has keys that are the same size/spacing as a standard plug-in keyboard. It's a heavy little thing, though! Presumably that's why it feels solid, not flimsy. For me, it's worth the weight to have the size.
customer_reviews.author: Dale F

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: After viewing this product on CBS Sunday Morning, I decided to get it for my wife. She mainly uses it to ease the typing difficulties with her phone, but it works just as well with her iPad. Needless to say, she loves it! It comes with a carrying case and folds up nicely when not in use... highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G. Bursae

customer_reviews.title: Fail - multiple keys don't work
customer_reviews.text: After sitting in my desk for two years charged up unit to try on new iPad and windows computer - multiple keys don't work - '2' 'w' 's' - all along the joint where the keyboard folds
customer_reviews.author: ecktoeman

customer_reviews.title: Will not work with Messenger.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard to use with Messenger on my phone. It is incompatible with Messenger. This is the second keyboard I tried and the other one didn't work with Messenger either. So the keyboard is fine. Messenger is the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a keyboard to use for my tablet that was very portable, but easy to use. This was great and very versatile. You can use this for iOS or android devices. I love the cover that is also used for a stand for my iPad. It also helps to protect the keyboard during transport.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for writing on the go.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard was a lifesaver for me. I had a paper due while I was in the hospital and I do town a tablet. Typing on my phone would have been a nightmare. I purchased the smaller version and it worked perfectly. Perfect size to pop in a purse or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Sail Away Girl

customer_reviews.title: Use with phone for text
customer_reviews.text: Use this with phone and tablet can keep up with younger thumbs when texting at work. Does go to sleep, need to hit escape once when not used for a while. My phone goes on a stand up charger at work and with keyboard you can keep up with text. Case doubles as stand for tablet or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Tony B.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many keyboard for my tablet, including keyboard cases. Their handy, but the problem is, I have large hands. I've tried many other separate keyboards, and thought I'd give it one more try with this one. This is by far, the very best portable keyboard. It is full sized and folds up small. It even had a cover, which transforms into a stand for your phone or tablet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this keyboard. Is a bit flat, and can be off balance if you put too much pressure on the right or left edge of the keyboard. When folded up, it is very small. There seems to be several versions of this keyboard available. This version was the cheapest with the case.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Terrible - many keys do not work unless you hit them very hard
customer_reviews.text: A folding keyboard is a nice idea but it works TERRIBLY. Unless you pound on the keys your typing does not register and you end up with lots of spelling errors from missing letters. Definitely not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle loves books

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this electronic treat!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't NEED this keyboard, but it is so much fun, and makes using my phone for online stuff so much easier. So glad that I treated myself.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: A Cute Wireless Keyboard for Mobile Devices
customer_reviews.text: Positives: nicely spaced keys for typing, light but sturdy carrying case, easily pairs with my iPad Air The spacing of keys on the right side seem to be not right (cannot point the exact reason). Could be just me. I like to type with both hands in classical typist style and more often than not I hit wrong keys, but only on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Anshu Bhatia

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my Galasy S7
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my Galasy S7. The stand adjusts to whtever angle needed. The only problem I had when I accidentally set it to DVORAK. Kind of looked like an ENIGMA code. I do wish there was a built in way to raise he back of the keyboard up to get a good angle but I managed to find something to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Walter R. Cullop

customer_reviews.title: Portability.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife. She types and loves the full size keyboard. Folded, it's compact and portable. Out of the box it's ready to use in less then five (5) minutes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Albert F. Milchanoski

customer_reviews.title: He says the keys are laid out a little funny, so he tends to hit the wrong ones
customer_reviews.text: Hubby uses it. He says the keys are laid out a little funny, so he tends to hit the wrong ones. It is a bit cramped, but that is to be expected. He also wishes it would lock open so it is easier to use on a lap. Other than that, he does like it. I know it is bigger than the one I have for my tablet and the layout is more like a standard keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Wolfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift - husband was having a hard time using the tiny keyboard on the cell phone. This keyboard is perfect. Not sure the little stand for the phone works that great but the keyboard is perfect. Folds up nice and small if you wanted to take it in a knapsack or briefcase - little bulky for a pocket. Good quality - worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Burley

customer_reviews.title: strong and super thin and solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but stopped to do so here. This IS THE keyboard you way. Heavy, strong and super thin and solid construction. (Heavy duty, not heavy to carry). This is a really well made and feels like a solid piece of tech. The case is cool, small and snug. Fast open and pack away. It is exactly the size of a box of Crayola markers, little bigger than your phone when closed. get this one, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: TK2.0

customer_reviews.title: Most portable / best bluetooth keyboard I have seen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for $40. It is very well made. The keyboard works very well and the case/stand is perfect, even for my tablet. Some have complained that there is no Delete key, however pressing FN plus Backspace does a Delete.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wood

customer_reviews.title: Just the tops.
customer_reviews.text: Damn, I love this keyboard (upon which I am writing this review). It is solid, compact (when folded), full size (when not). Thekeys are responsive and work every time. I have no hesitation in recommending it to anyone and everyone. A real pro product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Rose

customer_reviews.title: My wife left me
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is so awesome it stole my wife. Only buy this if your significant other is illiterate.
customer_reviews.author: myjudge2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slick
customer_reviews.text: Pros: connects quickly, low latency response and very compact. Con: the keyboard needs some locking mechanism to keep the sides from folding up while in use. Not all surfaces used with this will be flat!
customer_reviews.author: ProNewsPhotog

customer_reviews.title: I like the unadvertised feature that the keyboard ends have additional ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the full sized folding keyboard, which allows sufficient room for my bigger fingers. I like the unadvertised feature that the keyboard ends have additional pop out legs to prevent wobbling when typing near the end of the keyboard (in addition to the 2 main, interior legs). This seems well made and pairs with my tablet fine. I do not see a better one in my research on folding Bluetooth keyboards. I have not had it long enough to speak on durability, but I would guess it will last with its sturdy metal construction.
customer_reviews.author: ldflippen

customer_reviews.title: Too fat-fingered for phone-screen typing.
customer_reviews.text: I am a lousy texter. Folks send mutiple messages before I could respond. Not any more! I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R OLeary

customer_reviews.title: Actually Arrived A Day Earlier than Projected
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard actually arrived a day earlier than projected by Amazon. It's pretty heavy (about 1 pound) but the metal construction helps with the sturdiness issue.
customer_reviews.author: Paul - IPS

customer_reviews.title: very good keybord
customer_reviews.text: Everything so far look perfect. My only complain is about instructions how to connect Bluetooth. They are OK but if you loose it is hard to remember Fn+C etc. I would recommend to put those instructions as a sticker on the back?
customer_reviews.author: BMB

customer_reviews.title: Works Well With Android Nexus 6
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review on this keyboard. There is no keyboard lag, it paired easily with my Nexus 6, and locks in place, so you can balance it on your lap. The keys are almost as big as a regular keyboard - and yet it folds compactly and fits into my purse. The keys have a nice haptic "click" - just like a regular keyboard. Functions such as "undo" (control +z) work fine, without doing anything extra. I am 100% pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Crane

customer_reviews.title: Stutters keys.
customer_reviews.text: Tried relinking it to the phone, after 2-3 minutes of use the keyboard keys stutter and it becomes unusable. Turning off bluetooth every 3 minutes seems to fix the problem. All indications are that there is a problem with it and not with the phone, charger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard. Small, portable. Perfect for my iPad Pro. Bluetooth connection is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this keyboard - perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I labored over which portable keyboard to get for business travel - I'm so glad I decided on this one! I especially love the option to use bluetooth or USB connection, it comes in handy to have a choice between the two when working with my laptop. I'm using it to type this review, in fact! :-)
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: This types as good or better than my full size keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This types as good or better than my full size keyboard. I love it! After 13 months, a few of the keys stopped working. I emailed customer service and received a prompt reply. Even thought it was just out of warranty, they sent me another one anyway. Excellent customer service service. If it wasn’t for the keys malfunctioning after 1 year, I would have given it 5 stars. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!
customer_reviews.text: I have a good old reliable Nexus 10 that I needed to use a lot when my laptop died on a trip. Quickly scanned amazon for bluetooth keyboards and had this one overnighted. Works great. Keyboard is responsive with a nice solid feel and is comfortable for typing (I have pretty large hands, too). The case/stand is an added bonus. Clever design. I think this is an excellent value - recommend!
customer_reviews.author: superdogmom

customer_reviews.title: This trick little thing is quite nice to have
customer_reviews.text: This trick little thing is quite nice to have. I have big fingers and if you do too then this is what you're after. Folds up all cool like and is actually somewhat durable. The only trick thing is, if you have it on your lap you will need something for it to rest on. the only reason this thing doesn't have five stars is because it'll fold up without it being on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: unkw

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have every made. The keyboard is full sized. I am a touch typist and can easily type on this product. It is well made and comes with an awesome carrying case. It folds up very small. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David DoughertyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: An excellent iteration of a bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Superb full size keyboard which works with multiple operating systems. I've tried this with a phone, tablet and a PC. Bluetooth pairing was a cinch. The keys have a really nice feel with sufficient travel. The compact folding, tablet-standing case with magnetic clasp shows much attention to detail. It feels so sturdy, rigid and not too heavy. Definitely portable. One of my best purchases of 2016.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O

customer_reviews.title: This is the best portable wireless keyboard that I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is the best portable wireless keyboard that I have tried. Touch typing on this keyboard is no where as comfortable and typing on my laptop but good enough. It would be much better if there was a latch or snap to keep the keyboard to stay flat on your lap. I also thought that there were small stands to raise the keyboard up but could not find them.
customer_reviews.author: BDL

customer_reviews.title: What a great keyboard. I use this with a Surface Pro ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great keyboard. I use this with a Surface Pro 3 (opted for this keyboard because I can use it with other devices. Love how it folds up for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amardan

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Installed with absolutely no difficulty, feels nice and sturdy, and is the perfect size. I absolutely love this addition to my phone and tablet!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: key broke after 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, but one of the key broke after a few uses. I have kept the keyboard always in good condition and no hits or shocks. Now the M key doesn't work any more, it is just floating, not detaching entirely. I am frustrated and hesitate to recommend this to others although the first few uses were great.
customer_reviews.author: JuanC

customer_reviews.title: I like that it's light and portable
customer_reviews.text: I like that it's light and portable, and I don't have problems connecting. A few of the keys won't trigger reliably, and it's annoying enough to subtract two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Don Siler

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the handiest little pieces of tech ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the handiest little pieces of tech I own. If you work from your phone a lot, stuck in airports, on the road, at a tradeshow, whatever it may be this is very convenient and saves pulling out the tablet or laptop for every little task.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor L Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with the bluetooth folding keyboard the quality is great and easy setup. The size is prefect folds nicely and like that the case for the keyboard case makes and stand for the tablet and i didn't know that when i purchase so that was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Creel

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Windows 10 but this is not clearly stated. It should be easy to find this detail in the description!
customer_reviews.author: W P

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this keyboard. (I purchased the full sized.) Folds to a great compact size. I'm using it with my Lenovo Yoga tablet. Well made with good heft. Responsive as any keyboard I've ever used. Great to have copy/paste shortcuts. Absolutely phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: SD Daddio

customer_reviews.title: Plugable ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!!! I love anything by Plugable, because they have cool items with great design, that WORK!!! I am always seeking out their products. This keyboard is amazing. Small, portable, easy to use, and the case is a stand for your phone or tablet. I LOVE this!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SAM

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works very well with my phone. i go to college online and this allows me to study on my phone while on the go. doesn't take up much space either. battery life is nice.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence m taylor

customer_reviews.title: Keystrokes are finicky, but great keyboard nonetheless.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard that has made working from a tablet so much more feasible. The only reason it didn't get 5 stars is because it's a bit finicky. You have to be deliberate with your keystrokes and even still it misses some.
customer_reviews.author: BLeadbetter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Small, sturdy, same a regular keyboard placements, case folds to accommodate iPhone or iPad, will be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: wonderful device!! easy to connect and easy to use. Great keyboard size. Makes your cell phone a computer. LOVE IT!!! I AM CONNECTING TO A SAMSUNG NOTE 4, SAMSUNG NOTE 8.0, AND VERIZON ELIPSIS TABLET. WORKS EVERY TIME. BATTERY LASTS A LONG TIME TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I love using this with my iPad, it is easy to use and folds up small so I can carry it everywhere
customer_reviews.author: M. CollinsTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Feels solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: Super neat keypad for use with my iPad. Bluetooth connection and a great well-balanced touch when typing. So much faster than the on screen keyboard. Very portable too.
customer_reviews.author: AOG

customer_reviews.title: Solid keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is very portable and functional. I do have a habit of double punching some keys, and I am not sure if it is me or the keyboard. It is mainly the h's. Otherwise it is solid keyboard, and a good purchase. Used with: Samsung S20+
customer_reviews.author: SilereVita

customer_reviews.title: Great gear to buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard, I use it everyday at work when I’m on my lunch break, it dose a learning curve when you Bluetooth it, I found you if just open it, it automatically connects to my iPad and Samsung s6.
customer_reviews.author: Jgsilva808

customer_reviews.title: Long story short, get this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Super handy and easy to use ( not to mention that it amazes just about everyone that sees me use it ;) ) I recommend this keyboard above all other foldable keyboards that I saw because of the case/stand that comes with it. A good thing that I like is when you're handling it, it doesn't feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A winner!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, VERY well made, well thought out, very portable. It is taking longer to adjust to tightness of key placement compared to folio-case keyboards I've used with my iPad mini. My primary use is with my iPhone 6+. It is more convenient to carry phone and Plugable separately in my pockets than to tote the mini in a keyboard case, for, say, answering emails when in a coffee shop. I take the mini if I want to do serious writing.
customer_reviews.author: jbhsf

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for, with great customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful little device. It's a little bulky to carry in a pocket, but that's more than made up for by the excellent design. I'm a long-time touch typer who learned on manual keyboards, and I can type at full speed on this little beauty with no errors. What really blew me away was the customer service I received after some accidental damage to my keyboard. I contacted Plugable support and received support that was beyond my expectations. Absolutely recommended, a dozen times over, and Plugable has become my first choice for any new peripherals.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Super-geek’s PlayStation - Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a sexy, super-geeky workstation; I love it, wish I was using it now.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M

customer_reviews.title: Some keys don't always work
customer_reviews.text: The 'E' key doesn't work right, I have to press really hard to make it work. Other keys are similar. It is difficult to touch type on because of it. I have to constantly go back and edit the missing keys back in.
customer_reviews.author: Allen_TX_Reviewer

product_meta.title: Plugable Bluetooth Keyboard Compatible with iPhones, iPads, Android, and Windows, Full-Size Bluetooth Portable Keyboard (11.5 Inches) with Case and Stand for Faster Typing and Editing on The Go
product_meta.description:
Size:Full-SizeFull-Size Yet Portable
For fast typists or those with large hands, most folding keyboards are just too small for comfort! This sturdy Bluetooth keyboard features five rows of standard-sized keys laid out in classic keyboard style and properly spaced for accurate typing, along with a sixth row of function keys for frequently used Android, iOS, and Windows operations. When you are ready to go, it folds smaller than a paperback book and fits in a bag or briefcase with your tablet or phone.

Convenient Case
The custom-fitted case protects your keyboard when stowed, then folds into an adjustable stand that holds your tablet or smartphone while you type.

Durable
The durable anodized aluminium shell protects the keyboard on three sides while in use and covers it completely when closed. Sturdy stainless-steel hinges and screws are used throughout, ensuring long life and worry-free service.

Performance
Each individual key features the same high-quality scissors mechanism used on high-end keyboards. Charges from any USB port for weeks of use.

Compatibility
Tapping the function key plus a letter switches between compatibility modes for Android, iOS, and Windows, activating a device-appropriate set of function keys. These include keys for Home, Search, Cut, Copy, Paste, Rewind, Play/Pause, Fast-Foward, and Volume Up/Down. The Windows compatibility mode activates a full set of F1 through F12 function keys.
feature_bullets: COMPACT - Full-size portable Bluetooth travel keyboard folds into a convenient size to carry wherever you go. Features six rows of standard-sized keys in a standard layout. Dimensions are 11.5 x 4.6 x 0.5 inches (292 x 117 x 12.5 mm) when open.

PORTABLE - Comes with a protective leather-like case that folds into a convenient stand for your tablet or smartphone when using the keyboard. High-capacity Li-Ion battery charges quickly from a Micro USB port for weeks of normal use

VERSATILE - Works like a USB keyboard when plugged into a USB port using the included cable (Fn + 2 to activate. Connects to any Bluetooth host, including iPhones, iPads, Android phones and tablets, as well as Windows, Mac, and Linux computers

DESIGN - Durable anodized aluminium shell and stainless-steel hinges ensure long life. Large, well-spaced keys facilitate accurate typing using the same crisp scissor switch mechanism found on many OEM keyboards
2 YEAR WARRANTY - We love our Plugable products, and hope you will too. This product is covered by a 24 month limited warranty as well as Seattle-based email support

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars321 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
